price: ሉጥንም ለሕዝቦቹ ባለ ጊዜ (አስታውስ) «እናንተ ጠያፍን ስራ ትሠራላችሁን በእርሷ ከዓለማት አንድም አልቀደማችሁም፡፡
arabic: وَلُوطًا إِذۡ قَالَ لِقَوۡمِهِۦٓ إِنَّكُمۡ لَتَأۡتُونَ ٱلۡفَٰحِشَةَ مَا سَبَقَكُم بِهَا مِنۡ أَحَدٖ مِّنَ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walūṭan idh qāla liqawmihi innakum latatūna al-fāḥishata mā sabaqakum bihā min aḥadin mina al-ʿālamīna
